result.execSummary:
The defendant Foreno Coffin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manuf/Deliver Cocaine (>40g) [Modifiers: as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(cm)4.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
Court waived all costs and fees.
Defendant to participate in drug and/or alcohol counseling and treatment deemed appropriate by DOC and to pay all costs of treatment
Random Testing.
Not to possess or consume controlled substances or prescription medication w/out a valid prescription.
Defendant must submit to a DNA sample at the Ozaukee Co Jail

chargeModifiers.descr: as a Party to a Crime
